title: Narcotics file: the victims
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Youth - Drug use

description: Examines the various treatment programs being attempted throughout the world, admitting with reluctance that as yet there is no cure for heroin addiction. Shows drug-free communes, methadone maintenance, heroin maintenance, harsh jail sentences, one-to-one psychological treatment and prison-treatment centres.
